slides.title: private  appointment
slides.subtitle: FOR AN EXPERIENCE TAILORED TO YOU

storySection.title: A Story of Elegance
storySection.mainText:
Han Kuyumculuk represents much more than a diamond; it is a symbol that transforms the person you value, the special moments shared, and the feelings from the heart into light.

Han Kuyumculuk, carrying this meaning born from light, leaves a special place in every woman's heart; because behind every sparkle lies an unforgettable story.
storySection.linkText: The Story Where Light Turns to Love

FROM TODAY

investmentSection.description: Shape your future with confidence through certified investment-grade gold products. Every gram represents a steadfast step forward.

blogSection.title:
The Story of Diamonds,
The Inspiration of Elegance
blogSection.subtitle: HAN BLOG
blogSection.description: The Light of My Eyes Blog is crafted for those who believe that a diamond is not merely a jewel, but a bearer of meaning, emotion, and story.
blogSection.additionalText: In this space, you will find all the details you have been curious about, from rings to necklaces, from special occasion gifts to diamond selection guides, presented through inspiring content and expert perspectives.

sarmasik-inci-tanem.description: Uniting the most powerful symbol of love with elegance. Every ring, crafted with meticulously selected diamonds and masterful artisanship, is designed to accompany the most meaningful 'yes' moments in your life, from weddings to anniversaries, from special occasions to lasting memories. Timeless designs preserve their original brilliance even as the years pass.

baget-reina-yuzuk.description: The geometric elegance of baguette-cut diamonds meets modern lines. This distinctive design captures light from every angle, complementing your everyday sophistication while creating a dazzling effect on special occasions.

lotus-tektas-yuzuk.description: Inspired by the graceful unfolding of a lotus blossom, this solitaire ring showcases the center diamond in a truly unique manner. The gentle curves of the petals present a captivating dance of light from every angle.

sarmasik-inci-tanem-2.description: Uniting the most powerful symbol of love with elegance. Every ring, crafted with meticulously selected diamonds and masterful artisanship, is designed to accompany the most meaningful 'yes' moments in your life, from weddings to anniversaries, from special occasions to lasting memories.

Every ring, crafted with meticulously selected diamonds and masterful artisanship, is designed to accompany the most meaningful 'yes' moments in your life, from weddings to anniversaries, from special occasions to lasting memories.

baget-reina-yuzuk-4.description: The geometric elegance of baguette-cut diamonds meets modern lines. This distinctive design captures light from every angle, complementing your everyday sophistication while creating a dazzling effect on special occasions.

lotus-tektas-yuzuk-4.description: Inspired by the graceful unfolding of a lotus blossom, this solitaire ring showcases the center diamond in a truly unique manner. The gentle curves of the petals present a captivating dance of light from every angle.

Every ring, crafted with meticulously selected diamonds and masterful artisanship, is designed to accompany the most meaningful 'yes' moments in your life, from weddings to anniversaries, from special occasions to lasting memories.

damla-pirlanta-kolye.description: The graceful teardrop design lends a natural flow to your neckline. The center diamond captures light from every angle, offering an enchanting brilliance.

su-yolu-kolye.description: Inspired by the elegance of flowing water, this necklace reflects the graceful cascade of diamonds. Each stone presents a mesmerizing dance of light while lending an exquisite sense of movement to your neckline.

tektas-pirlanta-kolye.description: The most elegant expression of simplicity. The captivating brilliance of a single diamond, united with minimalist design, offers timeless sophistication.

anturaj-pirlanta-kolye.description: Diamonds encircling the center stone present a mesmerizing dance of light. The halo design adds distinction to your most special moments with its magnificent presence.

kalp-pirlanta-kolye.description: The heart, the universal symbol of love, meets the brilliance of diamonds. A design that expresses your feelings for your loved ones in the most elegant manner.

infinity-pirlanta-kolye.description: An elegant interpretation of the infinity symbol. The infinity design adorned with diamonds represents your everlasting love.

su-yolu-bileklik.description: A design inspired by the elegance of flowing water, creating a luminous movement on your wrist. Every diamond presents a mesmerizing dance of light.

baget-pirlanta-bileklik.description: The geometric elegance of baguette-cut diamonds meets modern lines. A design that lends a sophisticated touch to your wrist.

tenis-pirlanta-bileklik.description: The classic tennis bracelet design offers timeless sophistication with its sequence of diamonds. Each stone presents a captivating play of light.

kelepce-pirlanta-bileklik.description: A modern cuff design meets the brilliance of diamonds. The elegant form that embraces your wrist offers both sophistication and comfort.

zincir-pirlanta-bileklik.description: Diamonds dancing upon a delicate chain, the finest example of minimalist elegance. Sophistication suited for everyday wear.

charm-pirlanta-bileklik.description: The harmony of refined charm details and diamonds lends a playful air to your wrist. Each charm tells its own story.

tektas-pirlanta-kupe.description: The most elegant expression of simplicity. The captivating brilliance of a single diamond illuminates your face.

anturaj-pirlanta-kupe.description: Diamonds encircling the center stone offer a magnificent brilliance. The perfect choice for your most special occasions.

halka-pirlanta-kupe.description: A dance of diamonds in the classic hoop form. A timeless design that complements every style.

sallantili-pirlanta-kupe.description: Dancing diamonds present a luminous display with your every step. The captivating design draws all eyes to you.

civi-pirlanta-kupe.description: A minimalist stud design, perfect for everyday wear. Refined, elegant lines complete your sophistication.

damla-pirlanta-kupe.description: The elegance of the teardrop form meets the brilliance of diamonds. A sophisticated design that illuminates your face.

gelin-pirlanta-set.description: A magnificent set designed for your most special day. The perfect harmony of necklace, earrings, and ring completes your bridal elegance.

klasik-pirlanta-set.description: A timeless classic design, perfect for every special occasion. The harmonious unity of necklace, earrings, and ring.

modern-pirlanta-set.description: Contemporary lines and the brilliance of diamonds. A bold design that reflects the modern woman's elegance.

vintage-pirlanta-set.description: The union of nostalgic details and diamonds. A distinctive design that brings the elegance of the past into the present.

minimalist-pirlanta-set.description: The most elegant interpretation of the 'less is more' philosophy. Clean lines and the delicate touch of diamonds.

luks-pirlanta-set.description: A magnificent gathering of the finest diamonds. The pinnacle of luxury and elegance.

yuzuk.heroDescription:
This ring, even when not on the hand.
Sometimes when you look, sometimes when you simply feel...
From a place beyond words.
Like something irreplaceable.
That which stays...

kolye.heroSubtitle: Designs that sparkle with every glance.
kolye.heroDescription:
This necklace, for things that begin with a single look.
Felt as you draw closer, lingering unnamed...
Far from ostentation, close to the heart.
Like something you wish to protect.
A little more, with every moment...

bileklik.heroDescription:
This bracelet, like those that silently accompany you through the day.
Noticed with movement, present in stillness...
It blends into everyday life.
Without letting you forget, without pressing.
As if keeping awareness fresh...

kupe.heroDescription:
These earrings, not at first, but with time.
As you draw closer, as you grow accustomed...
Light, yet leaving a lasting impression.
Simple, quiet.
Between the glances...

set.heroDescription:
This set, for those seeking wholeness.
Finding meaning not alone, but together...
The pieces are beautiful individually,
but something else entirely when side by side.
As if feeling complete...

ozel-gunler.heroDescription: Gift selections designed to celebrate life's most precious moments. Perfect choices for engagements, weddings, anniversaries, or any special occasion.

dogum-gunu.heroDescription: Gift selections to make your loved ones' birthdays truly special. Diamond designs suited to every age and style.

anneler-gunu.heroSubtitle: The most precious gift for the most precious woman.
anneler-gunu.heroDescription: Distinctive diamond designs to express your love for your mother. Elegant, meaningful, and enduring gifts.

kadinlar-gunu.heroDescription: Give the special women in your life a meaningful gift on Women's Day. Designs that unite sophistication and elegance.

yeni-dogan.heroDescription: Meaningful gift selections specially curated for newborn babies and their families. The perfect welcome-to-the-world gift.

aksesuar.heroDescription: Accessories to complement your jewelry collection. Distinctive selections from hair clips to jewelry boxes.

tesbih.heroDescription:
The first thing you notice when you hold it is the silence.
Time relaxes a little, thought slows down.
Not the counts, but the pauses remain.
Meaningful not when you look, but when you pause.
After a while, you do not even notice it...

bileklik.heroSubtitle: Strength and grace on your wrist.
bileklik.heroDescription:
Like something that accompanies without drawing attention.
Making itself known with each movement.
Blending into the day, never falling behind.
Neither too much, nor too little.
Natural when it is there...

yuzuk.heroSubtitle: A symbol of strength and character.
yuzuk.heroDescription:
A feeling that changes each time you look at your hand.
Sometimes habit, sometimes like a weight.
From a place beyond words.
Neither wanting to tell, nor to hide.
Simply there...

kol.heroSubtitle: The perfect union of style and comfort.
kol.heroDescription:
Elegant and comfortable cuff pieces
designed for men.

prelovedCategory.heroSubtitle: Pieces that never lose their value with time.
prelovedCategory.heroDescription:
There are certain jewels
that never lose their value with time.
With their design, craftsmanship, and presence, they still carry the impact of the very first day.

Preloved pieces
consist of carefully selected, authenticity-preserved
jewels awaiting rediscovery.

Each one unites a story from its past
with the elegance of today.
Distinguished, unique, and within reach...

newArrivalsCategory.heroSubtitle: The newest designs, introduced to you first.
newArrivalsCategory.heroDescription:
New beginnings,
new stories,
new brilliance...

Every season, the most current designs
prepared exclusively for you come together in this collection.

Rather than following trends,
pieces that inspire you
to create your own style.

yuzukCategory.heroDescription:
Every ring tells a story.
Discover our unique designs
that reflect your story.

kolyeCategory.heroDescription:
Our necklaces, crafted with
meticulous artisanship and care,
add brilliance to every moment.

bileklikCategory.heroSubtitle: An elegant touch to your wrist.
bileklikCategory.heroDescription:
Every bracelet is a refined detail
that complements your style.
Discover our collection.

kupeCategory.heroDescription:
Our elegant earrings
make every moment special.
Designed for you.

setCategory.heroDescription:
Our jewelry sets,
thoughtfully brought together,
complete your style.

gozumunNuruCategory.heroSubtitle: Designs filled with meaning, crafted for your loved ones.
gozumunNuruCategory.heroDescription:
Gözümün Nuru collection
was designed as a symbol
of love and value.

tesbihCategory.heroDescription:
Our handcrafted prayer beads
offer quality and aesthetics
in perfect harmony.

erkekBileklikCategory.heroDescription:
Our masculine and refined bracelets
complete your style.

erkekYuzukCategory.heroDescription:
Refined and distinguished rings

footer.description: Han Kuyumculuk carries this meaning born from the heart of light, leaving a special place in every woman's heart; for behind every sparkle lies an unforgettable story.
